description: Unique surrogate identifier for this job title record; used as the primary key and to link to related data.
System-generated date and time when the record was created or last updated, likely stored as YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm; confirm format with SME.
Human-readable job role/title displayed in applications and reports.
Normalized role category assigned to each title to support reporting, security, and workflows.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a prior system; used for migration, cross-reference, or data lineage. Likely nullable; confirm with SME.
Name of the source table from a prior system associated with the mapped record; used for migration or lineage; confirm with SME.
